Author: Rich
Comment: Did you lose access to the unlimited Skype facility that Three offer? I’m guessing you did because you mention that you lost a few XSeries features. I absolutely rely on unlimited Skype calling, so wouldn’t want to lose that!

Author: Phil
Comment:
Doing the firmware upgrade wipes all your pre-installed apps so I no longer have Skype on my phone, but as far as I know it’s possible to reinstall it via Planet 3.

For what it’s worth, I typically use [Fring](http://www.fring.com/) for all my VoIP needs.

Author: Rich
Comment: Thanks for the information, I will make some more enquiries before I go ahead with this. I also use Fring, but don’t have an unlimited data contract, so keep my Fring usage to when I have WiFi nearby, and use Three’s Skype otherwise.
